Module count
Package count.model

Class MLMixedRate

java.lang.Object
count.model.ML
count.model.MLMixedRate
Direct Known Subclasses:
MLGamma
public class MLMixedRate
extends ML
Maximum likelihood for multi-class model with rate parameters and multipliers.
Author:
csuros
